name: Control Your Nerves
description:
Description

Journey through the day of a school kid in this interactive rhythmic visual novel. Throughout the day, you are confronted with uncomfortable situations involving a variety of characters, whereby you have to control your nerves through the power of rhythm! Passing or failing the rhythm mini-game means different outcomes and dialogue, and your day could get a lot worse if you fail a lot!
This game was a submission for the Mix and Game Jam 2020. The two genres we mixed are "Rhythm" and "Visual Novel".

Controls

Visual Novel: Continue button/space bar.

Rhythm: Left/Right/Up/Down arrow keys.
